participant_1.background:
I'm doing well at school, but I miss my dad a lot.
I value my relationship with my partner and make sure they know I am there for them.
I'm going to make my grandson a chocolate cake and brew a batch of beer.
i work at the hospital as a nurse.
I spent my last birthday watching The Walking Dead and writing a short story about it.

participant_2.background:
I remember sitting on my grandmother's porch, eating fresh-baked cookies and drinking lemonade.
i own a dog that is small.
I’m a Game of Thrones fan who worries about my mom’s health.
I lost my dog a few years ago, and I still miss him every day.
I took my black car to the desert and drove as fast as I could.

content.text: What is something you like to do with your family?
I love making cookies with my mom!
That's so sweet! Do you have any pets?
I have a little dog named Daisy!
Aww! I love dogs. What kind is she?
She's a chihuahua mix. She's the sweetest dog ever.
That's so awesome! I love chihuahuas. They're so cute.
What's something you like to do on your own?
I love to read. I read a lot of different genres, but I'm really into fantasy books right now.
Me too! I love fantasy books. I just finished reading The Stormlight Archive by Brandon Sanderson. It was so good!
I haven't read that one yet, but I've heard great things about it. I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's a really long series, but it's so worth it.
Okay, I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I'm always happy to give book recommendations.
You're a great conversationalist! Thank you for chatting with me.
You're welcome! I enjoyed talking to you too.
